name: obsidian-webpage-export
description: Exports an obsidian document as an HTML document / webpage / website, correctly including all styling and formatting.

scripts.build: tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && node esbuild.config.mjs production && cp manifest.json main.js styles.css '/Users/zhaihao/Documents/ORISON/.obsidian/plugins/webpage-html-export'
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json

author: Nathan George
